thread.section_title: Biz2Credit Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biz2Credit | biz2credit.com
thread.title: PAMELA FITZPATRICK

author: PAMELA FITZPATRICK
title: PAMELA FITZPATRICK
text: This is my first foray into this type of business lending, but I'd finally had it with commercial banks. Apparently being a long-standing customer pulling millions of dollars through business accounts, as well as with solid credit, means little to them these days. This route is more expensive, but it's quick and relatively painless if your numbers are solid. We all need capital to expand, and waiting for commercial bank approval can mean missing good opportunities. This might become my go-to option for lending.
